messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion]OT to DEB L was:  name calling
messages.msgSnippet: Deb, I forwarded your message to the group.  A Michele from .....   I don t know, somewhere out of state just rejoined and is missing you.  Said you and Barda
messages.messageBody:
Deb, I forwarded your message to the group. A Michele from ..... I don't know, somewhere out of state just rejoined and is missing you. Said you and Barda gave her the best advice.

Please do pop in next weekend if you get the time. It's just not the same without you.

You take care, girl.

Feel the love,
Nichole
----- Original Message -----
From: Deborah Lewis
To: Unschooling-Discussion@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, July 26, 2003 1:10 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] name calling


***When are you coming back?***

Hey Nichole! How are ya Lovie?

Maybe sooner than I thought. The influx of Minnesotan relatives has
waned and I have my guest/computer room (that's code for junk room) back.


Dylan and I are on the go all week and only home on weekends, lately.

I didn't make it to see Bob... sorry about the Tee Shirt...

I'll try to check in there next weekend and say hi to everyone.

Deb, waving at you across the continental divide.

Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
